00044 int closeDialog(){
00045   TerminalApp::getSingleton().closeDialog();
00046   return 1;
00047 }
00048 
00049 int btn1Action(){
00050   InfoDialog* id= new InfoDialog( "A test of InfoDialog", 60, 10 );
00051   id->setMessage("This dialog is a test. It tests the caption::WORD_WRAPPED. If it seems to work, it can be good for some differents purpose. To correctly test this word wrapped text, it must be very long so I add text, and text...");
00052 
00053   PushButton* pb=new PushButton( "OK" );
00054   pb->setAction( &closeDialog );
00055   id->addButton( pb );
00056 
00057   TerminalApp::getSingleton().showDialog( id );
00058 }

00060 int item1Action(){
00061   TerminalApp::getSingleton().showMessage("Item1 has been called");
00062 
00063   Window* w=new Window("Server information");
00064 
00065   Label* l=new Label("Essai de label");
00066   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l, 0, 0, 10, 1 );
00067 
00068   LineEdit* l2=new LineEdit("lineedit");
00069   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l2, 0, 1, 20, 1 );
00070 
00071   ListBox * lb=new ListBox( "Listbox" );
00072   lb->addItem("Item1");
00073   lb->addItem("Item2");
00074   lb->addItem("Item3");
00075   lb->addItem("Item4");
00076   lb->addItem("Item5");
00077   lb->addItem("Item6");
00078   w->getLayout()->addWidget( lb, 0, 2, 15, 8 );
00079 
00080   LineEdit* l3=new LineEdit("lineedit2");
00081   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l3, 20, 0, 20, 1 );
00082 
00083   LineEdit* l4=new LineEdit("lineedit3");
00084   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l4, 20, 1, 20, 1 );
00085 
00086   LineEdit* l5=new LineEdit("lineedit4");
00087   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l5, 20, 2, 20, 1 );
00088 
00089   PushButton* pb=new PushButton( "Cancel" );
00090   pb->setAction( &btn1Action );
00091   w->getLayout()->addWidget( pb, 20, 3, 20, 1 );
00092 
00093   // The ListView test
00094   ListView* lv=new ListView( "ListView test");
00095   lv->addColumn(new ListViewColumn("col1", 5));
00096   lv->addColumn(new ListViewColumn("col2", 8));
00097   lv->addColumn(new ListViewColumn("col3", 6));
00098   w->getLayout()->addWidget(lv, 20, 4, 30, 8);
00099 
00100   ListViewItem * lvi01=new ListViewItem();
00101   lvi01->addColumn("12345");
00102   lvi01->addColumn("12345678");
00103   lvi01->addColumn("123456");
00104   lv->addItem(lvi01);
00105 
00106   ListViewItem * lvi02=new ListViewItem();
00107   lvi02->addColumn("23456");
00108   lvi02->addColumn("23456789");
00109   lvi02->addColumn("234567");
00110   lv->addItem(lvi02);
00111 
00112   ListViewItem * lvi03=new ListViewItem();
00113   lvi03->addColumn("34567");
00114   lvi03->addColumn("34567890");
00115   lvi03->addColumn("345678");
00116   lv->addItem(lvi03);
00117 
00118   TerminalApp::getSingleton().addWindow(w, true);
00119 
00120   return 1;
00121 }
